item.title: A satisfying proof
item.author: ian@ianfox.io (Ian Fox)
item.description: In 1777, Georges-Louis Leclerc, Comte de Buffon posed the following question: Suppose we have a floor made of parallel wooden boards, each the same width, and we drop a needle onto the floor.
